alert.note: Alert for Duval (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 11:09PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Duval and east central Webb Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1109 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northeast of Ranchitos Las Lomas, or 24 miles west of Freer, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ranchitos Las Lomas. This includes US Highway 59 between mile markers 772 and 806. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
